softwareGame

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • softwareGame.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfaceGame

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceGame
    Run the game between a player and the computer.
    Version:
    march 2016

      Constructor for 2 players.Create a graphical interface and send it a message to enter the player's name.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.lang.String name)
        Create a stock, a board, two players (player and computer), initialize the graphical interface : hand, button and send it the first message.
        Parameters:

      • treatDoubleAnswer

        public void treatDoubleAnswer(Domino d)
        Take the selected domino, verify if it is the right one. If it is ok, call treatAnswer method otherwise send a message.
        Parameters:
        d - The selected domino.

      • treatAnswer

        public void treatAnswer(Domino d)
        When a player plays, we verify that the selected domino d may be put on the table. If it is the case, we remove d from the hand of the player and from the graphical hand. Then put d on the board and on the graphic board.
        Parameters:
        d - The domino selected by the player.

      • playerDraw

        public void playerDraw()
        The player draw. If the stock is empty, the player has to choose a Domino from his hand or Jump. otherwise the player can draw a Domino from the Stock until he can play.

      • computerPlay

        public void computerPlay()
        The computer plays in relationship with the state of the game. If state = n (with n =1,2,3,4,5,6) we look for a double n in the computer's hand. If yes, the computer plays else the player is asked to play the double domino (n-1). If n=0 we look for a double 0 in the computer's hand. If yes, the computer plays, otherwise the player is asked to play any other domino. If n=8 or 9 normal game managing the stock and the empty stock. If n=11 blocked game.

      • treatJumpAnswer

        public void treatJumpAnswer()
        To verify that the player does not cheat with the double.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main starts the game.
